divs: sighting details concerning the report submitted today sunday aug. 9 titled "discovery of ancient\current ufo landing & dumping site found on google maps" - the screenshot map provided with the report is a location at the northern end of the peninsula about 4 miles north of the village of sant' antonio di santadi, it. it is on the central west coast of the island of sardinia. it is easily recognizable at a height of 2000 feet on google maps. what evidence the submitter supposedly from wisconsin has for their claim is unknown to me. i make no claim about the site whatsoever. see my blog at http:\\alienvisitorevidence.blogspot.com
Summary: Location of "Discovery of Ancient/Current UFO Landing & Dumping Site found on Google Maps"
trends: There have been no other sightings in Arbus
This sighting has never been favorited.
